creator: bains_manjit@yahoo.co.uk
text:
I've downloaded the ant 1.3 binary and tried to run it (with J2SE SDK 1.3.1) 
and I keep getting this "out of env space" error. I've checked my ANT_HOME var 
is set correctly and the bin directory is in the path. 

ant -v does not give me any help either.

It is a problem with Win98 (surprise, surprise). You need to configure more
environment space. You can do that with a line similar to the following in
config.sys

shell=c:\command.com c:\ /p /e:32768

Check out the MS Knowledge base if you want more info.
creator: conor@apache.org
conor@apache.org
text: *** Bug 15080 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
